        Parameters:
        tDataSet - Training data set.
        iter - Number of iteratios of the algorithm.
        nProt - Number of prototypes generated.
        alpha_0 - Alpha constant.
        windowWidth - Window width constant.
        epsilon - Epsilon constant.
